title: Bug 21706: BidiUtil in win32 has unnecessary Class.forName() usage
description: The current implementation of BidiUtil in win32 involves unnecessary usage of Class.forName().
OB: BidiUtil in win32 uses Class.forName() unnecessarily.
EB: Implement a private constructor for BidiUtil. Since there are no non-static methods in this class, it would be beneficial to have a private constructor to prevent unnecessary instantiation. This won't add any size as the compiler provides a free public constructor by default. The change will simply make the constructor private instead of public.
SR: Modify the line above to: static Callback callback = new Callback(new BidiUtil().getClass(), "windowProc", 4); Although untested, this modification should maintain the same functionality.
